amendment.description: Amendment caps spending on the Farm Risk Management Election program at 110% of CBO-predicted levels for the first five (5) years in which payments are disbursed (FY 2016-2020).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to cap spending on the Farm Risk Management Election program at 110% of CBO-predicted levels for the first five (5) years in which payments are disbursed (FY 2016-2020).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 267 - 156 (Roll no. 257).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 267 - 156 (Roll no. 257).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Foxx.
